params.tokenId: The ID of the token to destroy

constructor.details: Creates an "empty" template token that will be cloned in the future

initialize(string,string,address).details: Upgrades an "empty" template. Initializes internal variables.

params.bridge_: The address of the bridge of the tokens

devdoc.title: A custom ERC721 contract used in the bridge

Burn(uint256).notice: Is emitted on every burn of the token

Mint(address,uint256).notice: Is emitted on every mint of the token

bridge().notice: Returns the address of the bridge

burn(uint256).notice: Destroys a token with a given ID

mint(address,uint256).notice: Creates tokens and assigns them to account

name().notice: Returns the name of the token

symbol().notice: Returns the symbol of the token
